column1: Mandapam is a panchayat town in Ramanathapuram district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. The famed Pamban Railway bridge and Vehicular bridge lie to the East of this Panchayat Town.
Mandapam is located at 9.28°N 79.12°E﻿ / 9.28; 79.12. It has an average elevation of 9 metres (29 feet).
